title: How to Set a 12‐Hour Clock on an iPhone

steps.title: Open your iPhone’s Settings.
steps.content: Open your iPhone’s Settings. Look for the gray cog icon on one of your home screens. It may be in the Utilities folder.

steps.title: Tap General.
steps.content: Tap General . It’s in the third section.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Date & Time.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Date & Time . It’s in the sixth group of settings.

steps.title: Slide the “24-Hour Time” switch to the Off position.
steps.content: Slide the “24-Hour Time” switch to the Off position. Your iPhone will now report the time in the 12-hour format, which is the default setting.
